# withUnsafeBackingIOSurfaceIfPresent(_:)

**Instance Method**

Access the IOSurface backing the pixel buffer if present.

## Declaration

```swift
func withUnsafeBackingIOSurfaceIfPresent<R>(_ block: (IOSurface) throws -> sending R) rethrows -> sending R?
```
